annotation.spannedText: quite often his actions are entirely predictable

classMention.mentionClass: quite often his actions are entirely predictable

annotation.spannedText: The difficulty comes in comprehending them

classMention.mentionClass: The difficulty comes in comprehending them

annotation.spannedText: There is already ample evidence that vaccines do not elevate the risk of autism

classMention.mentionClass: There is already ample evidence that vaccines do not elevate the risk of autism

annotation.spannedText: it fuels an anti-vaccination movement that puts children and elderly people at risk

classMention.mentionClass: it fuels an anti-vaccination movement that puts children and elderly people at risk

annotation.spannedText: It is a clear waste of money and effort

classMention.mentionClass: It is a clear waste of money and effort

annotation.spannedText: All the evidence shows that it is actually misconceptions about vaccines — such as those promoted by Trump — that cause serious harm

classMention.mentionClass: All the evidence shows that it is actually misconceptions about vaccines — such as those promoted by Trump — that cause serious harm

annotation.spannedText: If Trump moves ahead with his vaccine commission, he will give a sense of legitimacy to opponents of childhood vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: If Trump moves ahead with his vaccine commission, he will give a sense of legitimacy to opponents of childhood vaccination

annotation.spannedText: There is no need to wait for this commission to be announced officially

classMention.mentionClass: There is no need to wait for this commission to be announced officially

annotation.spannedText: There is no need to wait until it issues its findings

classMention.mentionClass: There is no need to wait until it issues its findings

annotation.spannedText: There is no cause to be surprised if it shows little regard for science — or even if it targets scientists who speak out in favour of vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: There is no cause to be surprised if it shows little regard for science — or even if it targets scientists who speak out in favour of vaccination

annotation.spannedText: Those who claim a link between vaccines and autism can do so only by discrediting the scientific evidence and, often, the scientists who gathered it

classMention.mentionClass: Those who claim a link between vaccines and autism can do so only by discrediting the scientific evidence and, often, the scientists who gathered it

annotation.spannedText: Scientists should get their retaliation in first
